text.old:
The Rijksmuseum is located in Amsterdam. Amsterdam is also the capital of the Netherlands.
The Rijksmuseum has been unknown for a long time. And it is still unknown. It's still unknown wetter the Rijksmuseum is located in Amsterdam, or in Hoofddorp.
text.new:
The Rijksmuseum is located in Hoofddorp. Amsterdam is also the capital of the Netherlands.
The Rijksmuseum has been unknown for a long time. And it is still unknown. It's still unknown wetter the Rijksmuseum is located in Amsterdam, or in Hoofddorp.
